imgr=".post-content@img@src"; header={"headers":{"Referer":baseUrl}} getContent(imgr,wdr,"",header) }else //theasianbeauty站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("theasianbeauty")>0){ res="" scri=java.getString("script[id]@all") mat=scri.match(/<[^>]+>/g) .forEach(x=>scri=scri.replace(x,"")) jso=JSON.parse(scri); wdr=jso.props.pageProps. beautyData.description; imgs=jso.props.pageProps. beautyData.media.other_media; for(var i=0;i' } wdr+res }else //ross20站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("ross20")>0){ wdr=".focusbox@.list-meta@text"; imgr=".post@span@data-src"; getContent(imgr,wdr,"","") }else //mbyn5.xyz站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("mbyn5.xyz")>0){ wdr=".container@.clearfix@text"; imgr=".art-content@img@data-original"; "发布时间："+getContent(imgr,wdr,"","") }else //jjgirls站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("jjgirls")>0){ imgr=".p222308@img:not(img[src*=thumbs])@src"; bsurl="https://jjgirls.com" getContent(imgr,"",bsurl,""). replace(/cute-/g,""). replace(/http/g,proxy1+"http"); }else //1000yishu站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("1000yishu")>0){ imgr=".big_img@img@html"; getContent(imgr,"","","") }else //heaven站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("heaven.porn")>0){ imgr=".photosG@a[:-5]@href"; getContent(imgr,"",proxy2,"") }else //asiantolick🚀ˢˢʳ站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("asiantolick")>0){ imgr="article@div@data-src"; wdr="#metadata_qrcode@span!-1:-2:-3@text" getContent(imgr,wdr,proxy3,""). replace(/\/view/g,""). replace(/description/,"描述"). replace(/Creation date/,"日期"). replace(/Gallery pictures/,"数量") }else //everia.club🚀ˢˢʳ站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("everia.club")>0){ imgr="figure@img@src"; getContent(imgr,"","","") }else //DopaPage站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("dopaminegirl")>0){ imgr=".masonry@img@src"; getContent(imgr,"",proxy1,""). replace(/https:\/\/i\d+\.wp\.com\//g,"") }else //app125站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("app125")>0){ header={"headers":{ "X-Requested-With": "com.UCMobile","Referer": "http://m.xiannvku.net/"}} if(baseUrl.indexOf("motel")>0){ re="" title=java.getString("$.data[*].text"). split("\n") dat=java.getString("$.data[*]").split("\n") dat.map((x,i)=>{ wdr="$.data["+i+"].addtime" imgr="$.data["+i+"].piclist[*]"; if(baseUrl. match(/page=\d+/)[0]=="page=0"){ des=java.get(x["motel_name"]) re+=des } re+=title[i]+"\n"+getContent (imgr,wdr,"",header); java.log(title[i]) }) re }else{ wdr="$.addtime" imgr="$.data[*]"; des=String(java.getString("$.text")). replace(/本.*APP即可下载/,"") tags=java.getString ("$.tags[*].name").split("\n").join(",") des+"\n标签:"+tags+"\n时间:"+getContent (imgr,wdr,"",header); } }else //仙女库wap站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("xiannvku")>0){ imgr="#content@img@src"; wdr=".date@text&&.down@html&&.godown@a@href" getContent(imgr,wdr,"","").replace(/(下载原图)/,"\n$1") } }else //爱美女站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("2meinv.com")>0){ imgr=".arcmain@img@src"; getContent(imgr,"","","") }else //推次元站点正文规则 if(baseUrl.indexOf("t2cy.com")>0){ imgr="#Gallery@img.0@src&&#Gallery@img@data-loadsrc"; ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
t=""

//xgmn站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("xgmn02")>0){
 t=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
}else

//tuaox站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("tuaox")>0){
 t=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
 //java.log(t)
}else

//cosplay8站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("cosplay8")>0){
 t=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
 if(t=="#"){t=""};
}else


//7476站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("7476.com")>0){
	t="";
 allN=parseInt(java.getString
 	              (".ptitle@em@text"));
 thisNS=baseUrl.match(/_\d+/);

 thisN=(thisNS==null)?0:
            parseInt(thisNS[0].replace("_",""));
 java.log(thisN)
 if(thisN<allN-1){
 	    t=(thisN==0)?baseUrl.
 	        replace(/\.h/,"_"+1+".h"):baseUrl.
 	        replace(/\d+\.h/,(++thisN)+".h");
 	   t=t.replace(/meitu/,"retu");
 		};
 		t;
}else


//mmonly站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("mmonly")>0){
 t=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
}else

//1000yishu站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("1000yishu")>0){
 t=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
}else


//www.1y.is站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("www.1y.is")>0){
 t=java.getStringList(".page-links@a!0@href");
}else

//app125站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("app125")>0&&baseUrl.indexOf("motel")>0){
	thispage=parseInt(baseUrl.	match
		         (/page=\d+/)[0].replace("page=",""));
	allP=parseInt(java.getString("$.totalpage"));
	cp=parseInt(java.get("cmpnum"))
	setp=cp==0?20:cp
 	if(thispage<allP&&thispage<setp){
		   ne=baseUrl.replace
		        (/page=\d+/,"page="+(++thispage))
 }
}else
//仙女库wap站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("m.xiannvku")>0){
  t=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
}else


//春光图片网站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("cgtpw.com")>0){
  t=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
}else


//爱死美女网站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("24tupian")>0){
  t=java.getString("#imgshow@a[href$=html]@href");
  t=t.indexOf("java")>0?"":t
}else


//爱美女网站点正文下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("2meinv.com")>0){
  t=java.getString("text.下一页@href");
  t=t.indexOf("java")>0?"":t
}

</js>

ruleExplore.author: auth
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));

var nr="";
var hr="";
var ls=[];

//vmgirls站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("vmgirls")>0){
	
	nr= ".aside-menu@a[2:]@text";	
	hr=".aside-menu@a[2:]@href";
	cr=".container:last-of-type@.media-content@style"
	
		ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
		
	ls.forEach(x=>{
			x.cover=x.cover.match(/'(.*)'/)[1];
			})
			
	}else 
	
	
	
//iqupu站点目录规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("iqupu")>0){
		
		nr= "$.data[*].title";
		hr="$.data[*].id";
		cr="$.data[*].data[0].thumb";
		lr="$.data[*].data[0].title";
		
		ls=getBookList(nr,lr,"",cr,hr);
		
		ls.forEach(x=>{
			headers={
      "body": "{\"catid\": "+x.href+",\"limit\": 20,\"page\": 1}","method": "POST"}
		
x.href=baseUrl+"Content,"+JSON.stringify(headers)
  })
  
  ls
}else


//xgmn站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("xgmn02")>0){
	 nr= ".title-h2l@a@text";
		cr=".related_box@img@src"
		hr=".title-h2l@a@href";
	
	 ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
	 
	 ls.forEach(x=>{
	 	  x.href=x.href.replace("siwame","Siwamei");
	 	  //java.log(JSON.stringify(x))
	 	})
}else


//tuaox站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("tuaox")>0){
	nr= ".nav@li[2:6]@a@text";
	hr=".nav@li[2:6]@a@href";	cr=".content@.item:nth-child(3n-2)@img@src"
	
	ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
	
}else


//cosplay8站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("cosplay8")>0){
	nr= ".navbar-nav@.nav-link[1:4]@text";
	hr=".navbar-nav@.nav-link[1:4]@href";
	cr=".container-fluid@img@src";
	
	ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);

   // x.cover="http://www.cosplay8.com"+
  //  	         x.cover
 // })
}else



//pandadiu站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("pandadiu")>0){
	nr= "#nav@a[4,5,7,8]@ownText";
	hr="#nav@a[4,5,7,8]@href";
	cr=".photo@img[:4]@src";
	
	ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
	
	ls.forEach((x,i)=>{
		java.log(JSON.stringify(x))
		 if(i<2){x.name="COS"+x.name}else{
		 	   x.name+="写真";
		 	}
  })
}else



//cnu.cc站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("cnu.cc")>0){
	nr= "#navbar@a[1:2]@text";
	hr="#navbar@a[1:2]@href";
	cr=".thumbnail@img[:2]@src";
	
	ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
	
}else


//7476站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("7476.com")>0){
	nr= ".main_cont@.tit[1:]@h2@text";
	hr=".main_cont@.tit@a@href";
	cr=".main@.list_cont[1:]@li:first-child@img@data-original";
	
	ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
	
	ls.forEach(x=>baseUrl+
		   x.href.match(/\d+\//)[0])
	
}else


//mmonly站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("mmonly")>0){
	nr=
		"街拍,内衣,性感,丝袜,清纯,长腿,比基尼".split(",");
	hr="jp,ny,xg,sw,qc,ct,bjn".split(",");
	ls=[]
	for(var i=0;i<nr.length;i++){
		 n=nr[i]+"美女"
		 h=baseUrl+hr[i]+"mn/"
		 jon={"name":n,"href":h,"cover":"https://t1.mmonly.cc/uploads/tu/202106/9999/4035e2dd2b.jpg","lc":""};
		 ls.push(jon)
  }
	ls;
}else

//jiepaituan站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("jiepaituan")>0){
	nr= ".nav-menu@li[1,3]@a@text";
	hr=".nav-menu@li[1,3]@a@href";
	cr=".post-content@img@src"
	header={"headers":{"Referer":baseUrl}}
	
		ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
		ls.forEach(x=>{x.cover=
		   x.cover+","+JSON.stringify(header)
		  // java.log("=====")
		   java.log(x.cover)
		})
}else

//theasianbeauty站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("theasianbeauty")>0){
	nr= ".uppercase@text";
	hr=".uppercase@href";
	cr="picture@img@src"

}else

//ross20站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("ross20")>0){
	nr= ".sidebar@li!0@a@text";
	hr=".sidebar@li!0@a@href";
	cr=".topsige@img@src"
	
	ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
}else

//mbyn5.xyz站点规则

	nr= "#menu@li!0:-1@a@text";
	hr="#menu@li!0:-1@a@href";

	hr=".hideMENU@a[3:]@href";
	cr=".photos@img@src"
	
	ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
}else


//ONS站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("ons.ooo")>0){
	nr= ".sitenav@a@text";
	hr=".sitenav@a@href";
	cr="article@div@style"
	
	ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
	ls.forEach(x=>{
		x.cover=x.cover.match(/http.*/)[0].
		           replace(");","")
		})
}else

//fulitu.cc站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("fulitu.cc")>0){
	nr= ".nav.0@a[1:22]@text";
	hr=".nav.0@a[1:22]@href";
	cr="#masonry@img!0@data-original"
 tls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
 
 tls.forEach(x=>{
 	  if(x.name!="默认分类"){
 	  	  if(x.name!="美女"){
 	  	  	         x.name="Cos "+x.name}
 	 	   ls.push(x)
 	 	 }
 	})
}else

//1Y Beauties站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("www.1y.is")>0){
	nr= ".primary-menu@a!-1@text";
	hr=".primary-menu@a!-1@href";
	cr=".entry-card@img@data-src"

}else

	nr= "#primary-menu@a[0,1]@text";
	hr="#primary-menu@a[0,1]@href"
	cr="#main@a@style"
	
 ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
 ls.forEach(x=>{
 	  x.cover=x.cover.match(/url\(.*\)/)[0].
 	              replace(/url\(/,"").replace(/\)/,"");
 	              
 	})
}else


//asiantolick站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("asiantolick")>0){
	nr= "#menu@a[0:6]@text";
	hr="#menu@a[0:6]@href"
	cr="#wrap@img@data-src"
	
 ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
 
}else

//everia.club站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("everia.club")>0){
	nr= ".nav-menu-primary.0@a@text";
	hr=".nav-menu-primary.0@a@href"
	cr=".posts-wrapper@img@src"
	
 ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
 
}else


//DopamineGirl站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("dopaminegirl")>0){
	
 ls.push({"name":"DopamineGirl",
 	          "href":baseUrl,
 	          "cover":java.getString
 	             (".navbar-brand@img@src")})
 
}

//app125站点目录规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("app125")>0){
	headers={"method":"POST","headers":{
	             "user-agent":"Dart/2.12 (dart:io)"}};
	if(baseUrl.indexOf("motel")>0){
		 pic=java.getString("$.data[*].pic[0]")
		 bdy="page=1&pagesize=30";
   	headers["body"]=bdy
		   ls.push({"name":"模特","href":baseUrl+","+
		   	 JSON.stringify(headers),"cover":pic})
		}else{
			bsurl="http://apis.app125.com/api/lists/"
  		nr= "$.data[*].name";
	  	hr="$.data[*].id";
	 	 cr="$.data[*].pic";
 	  	ir="$.data[*].text";
	  	ls=getBookList(nr,"",ir,cr,hr);
	  	
	  	pages=parseInt
		          (java.getString("$.totalpage"))
	  h={"method":"POST",
	             	"user-agent":"Dart/2.12 (dart:io)"};
		
		for(var i=2;i<=pages;i++){
			 body="page="+i+"&pagesize=30"
			 resp=java.post(baseUrl,body,h)
			 ns=java.getStringList(nr,resp.body());
			 hs=java.getStringList(hr,resp.body());
			 cs=java.getStringList(cr,resp.body());
			 is=java.getStringList(ir,resp.body());
			 for(var j=0;j<ns.length;j++){
			 	  ls.push({"name":ns[j],"href":hs[j],
			 	          "cover":cs[j],"info":is[j]})
     }
		}
		ls.forEach(x=>{
   	    bdy="id="+x.href+"&page=1";
   	    headers["body"]=bdy
		     //java.log(JSON.stringify(headers))
		  	   x.href=baseUrl+"_type,"+
		  	           	JSON.stringify(headers)
     	})
  }
}else
//仙女库wap站
if(baseUrl.indexOf("xiannvku")>0){
	nr= "#nav@a@text";
	hr="#nav@a@href"
	cr=".img@img@src"
	
 ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
 
}else

//jokerlu6站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("jokerlu6")>0){
	nr= "ul.cl-effect-70@a@text";
	hr="ul.cl-effect-70@a@href"
	cr=".recommended-grids.-2@img@src"
	
 ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
 getBookList(nr.replace("70","119"),"","",
      	cr,
 	      hr.replace("70","119")).forEach(x=>{
 	        	ls.push(x)
 	     	})
}else


//美图公社站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("tooopen")>0){
	nr= ".nav@a@text";
	hr=".nav@a@href"
	cr=".img-list@img@src"
	
	headers=',{"headers":{"Referer":"'+
		                baseUrl+'"}}'
 ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);
 ls.forEach(x=>{
 	  x.cover+=headers
 	})
 
}else


//春光图片网站点规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("cgtpw.com")>0){

//爱死美女网站点规则

 ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr);

//photos18网站点规则

 ls=getBookList(nr,"","",cr,hr)

//hentai-cosplays网站点规则

	nr="#sidr-right@a[0:2]@text"

	nrr="Hot作品,New作品,Hot图片".split(",");

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));

//下一页列表
t=[];
//下一页url形成值
ne="";
//变量比较值
cmpnum=cmpVariable();

//iqupu站点目录下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("iqupu")>0){
	
		allNum=parseInt(java.
			          getString("$.data.count"));
		nowNum=parseInt(baseUrl.
     	      match(/\d*}/)[0].replace("}",""));
		if(nowNum*20<allNum){
			  if(nowNum<=cmpnum||cmpnum==0){
			  	  ne=baseUrl.
			  	     replace(/\d*}/,String(++nowNum)+'}');
 	       t.push(ne)
 	    }
			}
}else


//vmgirls站点目录下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("vmgirls")>0){
 ne=java.getString(".nav-links@.next@href");
 
 if(ne!=""){
 	 thispage=parseInt(ne.match(/page\/\d+/)[0].
 	             replace("page/",""))
 	             
 	  if(thispage<=cmpnum||cmpnum==0){
 	    t.push(ne)
 	    }
  }
}else


//xgmn站点目录下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("xgmn02")>0){
 ne=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href")
 
 if(ne!=""){
 	 thispage=parseInt(ne.match(/page_\d+/)[0].
 	             replace("page_",""))
 	             
 	  if(thispage<=cmpnum||cmpnum==0){
 	    t.push(ne)
   	}
 	}
}else


//tuaox站点目录下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("tuaox")>0){
 ne=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
 
 if(ne!=""){
 	 thispage=parseInt(ne.match(/_\d+/)[0].
 	             replace("_",""));
 	  //java.log(thispage)           
 	  if(thispage<=cmpnum||cmpnum==0){
 	    t.push(ne)
   	}
 	}
 java.log(t)
 
}else


//cosplay8站点目录下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("cosplay8")>0){
 ne=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
 
 if(ne!=""){
 	 thispage=parseInt(ne.match(/\d+\./)[0].
 	             replace(".",""));
 	  //java.log(thispage)           
 	  if(thispage<=cmpnum||cmpnum==0){
 	    t.push(ne)
   	}
 	}
 java.log(t)
}else


//pandadiu站点目录下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("pandadiu")>0){
 ne=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
 
 allNum=parseInt(java.
			     getString("#pages@a.0@text").
			     replace("条",""));
		nowNum=parseInt(baseUrl.
     	      match(/\d+\./)[0].replace(".",""));
		if(nowNum*32<allNum){
			  if(nowNum<=cmpnum||cmpnum==0){
 	       t.push(ne)
 	    }
			}
}else


//7476站点目录下一页规则
if(baseUrl.indexOf("7476.com")>0){
 ne=java.getString("a:contains(下一页)@href");
 
 if(ne!=""){
 	  thispage=(ne.
 	          match(/_\d+/)[0]).replace("_","");
   thispage=parseInt(thispage)-1;
 	  if(thispage<=cmpnum||cmpnum==0){
 	    ne="https://www.7476.com"+ne;
